text: Obaida Al-Samarneh (; born February 17, 1992) is a Jordanian football player who plays as a midfielder for Al-Wehdat. He is also a member of Jordan national football team. == International career == He played his first match with the Jordan national senior team against Lebanon in an international friendly on 31 August 2016, which resulted in a 1–1 draw. == International career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" ! colspan=3 | Jordan national team |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2016||2||0 |- |2017||4||0 |- |2018||4||0 |- !Total!!10!!0 |} == References == == External links == * jo.gitsport.net * Category:Association football midfielders Category:Jordan international footballers Category:Al-Faisaly SC (Amman) players Category:1992 births Category:Jordanian footballers Category:Living people Category:Al-Ahli SC (Amman) players Category:Kufrsoum SC players Category:Ittihad Al-Zarqa players Category:2019 AFC Asian Cup players
title: Obaida Al-Samarneh
